page.title: 10Industry contd.
page.content: Brightlingsea is also famous for the building of fast racing boats in the multihull classes. The classes that are currently the rage are{Mystere}and{Tornado. The Mystere is a class on its own but is also regarded by many as the training boat for its big brother the Tornado, this being the Olympic class racing machine. Both of these machines ( for their specifications and performance take them far beyond that of mere sailing boats ) are hand built, to very fine tolerances, in the workshops of{Reg {White.}The spars and beams are manufactured just across the road in the workshops of{Sailspar Ltd.}These too have very fine tolerances in order to satisfy the International scrutineers,for the complete units are exported all over the world.
